sourcesContent:
<template>
    <form @submit.prevent>
        <custom-input 
            v-model="info.title"
            class="input-title"
            placeholder="Название"
            type="text"
        />
        <custom-input
            v-model="info.quantity"
            class="input-quantity"
            placeholder="Количество"
            type="number"
        />
        <custom-input
            v-model="info.distance"
            class="input-distance"
            placeholder="Расстояние"
            type="number"/>
        <custom-button @click="addRow" style="margin: 10px">Добавить строку</custom-button>
    </form>
</template>

<script>
    import axios from 'axios';

    export default {
        data() {
            return {
                info: {
                    title: '',
                    quantity: 1,
                    distance: 0
                }
            }
        },
        methods: {
            addRow: async () => {
                const $host = axios.create({
                    baseURL: process.env.VUE_APP_API_URL
                })
                const row = this.info
                const data = await $host.post('api/table', row)
                return data
            }
        }
    }
</script>

<style lang="css" scoped>
    .input-title,
    .input-quantity,
    .input-distance {
        width: 400px;
    }
</style>
